overview.en:
Bobbie Pets is the strategic investment of Blockchain Global Limited, which is a global blockchain technology commercialization and investment company. 
It is a pet blockchain economy which turns the real economy  into permit form and jointly built by multiple geek technology teams in China and Australia. It is based onthe IPFs technology and POC consensus mechanism,  covers pet purchase / breeding, pet food / supplies, pet beauty, pet medical and other services, The launch of the application scenario of building a new pet economy with blockchain technology. It carries the new revolutionary significance for the trillion pet market, issued a total of 25 million BPC permits
overview.zh: 波比宠物（Bobbie Pets）是全球区块链科技商业化及投资公司Blockchain Global Limited战略投资、中澳多个极客技术团队联合打造的宠物区块链实体产业通证化经济，基于IPFS技术与POC共识机制，全面切入宠物购买/配种、宠物食品/用品、宠物美容、宠物医疗，铺开以区块链技术搭建宠物新经济的落地应用场景，承载着为万亿宠物市场赋予新的革命意义，发行通证BPC，总量2500万枚。
